title: Mech Clash - Action Music Collection
description: Step into a universe where music and imagination collide. Introducing 'Mech Clash,' an exclusive collection of 8 EDM tracks meticulously crafted for the discerning game developer.
longDescription:
Step into a universe where music and imagination collide. Introducing 'Mech Clash,' an exclusive collection of 8 EDM tracks meticulously crafted for the discerning game developer. Infused with the spirit of science fiction, each track pulsates with futuristic vibes and otherworldly energy, perfect for setting the tone in your next gaming masterpiece.


LOOPED - This album's tracks have a standard version and a looped version for easy game integration into any scenario


From the neon-lit streets of cyberpunk cities to the mysterious depths of alien worlds, 'Mech Clash' provides the perfect auditory backdrop. Whether you're powering up an intense space chase or painting a serene intergalactic landscape, this collection offers a wide sonic palette, blending electronic beats with the mystique of the cosmos.


Harness the power of 'Mech Clash' and elevate your game to the next level. A soundscape where beats meet the beyond, this collection is your ticket to an interstellar journey unlike any other. Dive in and let your games resonate with the pulse of the universe.


--


Contains 2 Bonus Tracks


--

Music Preview 3: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wWw3tfGg4ME


--


We also have a number of other music collections and bundles available for sale at our publisher page, click here to check out our catalogue.
technicalDetails:

Do Sound FX loop: (No)

Number of cues: 20

Minutes of audio provided: 25minutes

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)
